decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (001, 002, 050, 051, 052, 053, 054, 055, Daylight/Sunlight and Overshadowing Report, Received: 18/08/2016. 076 Rev B, 077 Rev B, 078 Rev B, 079 Rev B, Received: 12/10/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the flank elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to prevent the lower sash opening and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of a rear outrigger extension with roof windows to the house
